title: Auth & Identity
description: OAuth (Google/Microsoft), JWT/refresh, MFA, RBAC, rate limiting and security controls; FE login/guards.
markdown:
## Auth & Identity

**Objective:** Deliver secure auth flows (OAuth, JWT/refresh), MFA/RBAC, rate limits, and FE guards.

### Details
- Providers: Google, Microsoft (Graph)
- Tokens: access/refresh, rotation, storage hardening
- MFA: TOTP
- RBAC: roles/permissions
- FE: login, protected routes
